titleStmt.title: The martyrdome of King Charles, or His conformity with Christ in his sufferings. In a sermon on I Cor. 2.8. / preached at Bredah, before his Maiesty of Great Britaine, and the Princesse of Orange. By the Bishop of Downe. June 3. 13. 1649.
titleStmt.author: Leslie, Henry, 1580-1661.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Samuel Broun, English bookseller, dwelling in the Achter-om at the signe of the English Printing house,

notesStmt.note: Reproductions of originals in Cambridge University Library and the British Library.
